alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 4:56AM CST until January 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total sleet and snow accumulations of up to one inches and ice accumulations between one tenth to quarter of an inch with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central Arkansas, north central and northwest Louisiana and northeast Texas. * WHEN...From noon Sunday to 6 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
